BackstoryDef.title: clairvoyant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] always seemed to know more about the world than [PAWN_pronoun] should have at [PAWN_possessive] age. Many villagefolk claimed that [PAWN_pronoun] was a messenger from above, and begged for [PAWN_possessive] insight into their futures.

BackstoryDef.title: astronomer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] always had [PAWN_possessive] head in the clouds, looking at the vast, limitless space above, wishing to be part of it. [PAWN_nameDef] charted the stars for [PAWN_possessive] community, who shunned [PAWN_possessive] work, encouraging [PAWN_objective] to prioritise [PAWN_possessive] home planet before daydreaming about any others.

BackstoryDef.title: archer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] learned the art of ranged combat from a young age, with [PAWN_possessive] mother — the clan leader — as [PAWN_possessive] teacher. Part of the clan’s oath was to never bring harm unto animals.

BackstoryDef.title: sacrifice
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was captured by a religious sect and was due to be offered to their God as a sacrifice. [PAWN_possessive] hopes of a gallant knight coming to [PAWN_possessive] rescue never came to fruition, so [PAWN_nameDef] took matters into [PAWN_possessive] own hooves, and [PAWN)pronoun] tunnelled [PAWN_possessive] way to freedom.

BackstoryDef.title: flower child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by a tribe of compassionate and beautiful fauns, who taught [PAWN_objective] to appreciate, love and nurture the world around [PAWN_objective]. Seeing humans pave over [PAWN_possessive] planet with their monochrome structures gave [PAWN_nameDef] a vendetta against all of mankind.

BackstoryDef.title: literate
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Unlike many of [PAWN_possessive] kin, [PAWN_nameDef] learned to read and write by reading stolen human texts. Over time, [PAWN_nameDef] penned fantastical stories about [PAWN_possessive] life in the wilderness, hoping for others to read about the ways of [PAWN_possessive] community.

BackstoryDef.title: cup bearer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a revered, high-ranked official who entertained and poured drinks during aristocratic gatherings and soirées.

BackstoryDef.title: archer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] earned [PAWN_possessive] keep by venturing into the overgrowth and hunting big-game. The sprightly, young children of [PAWN_possessive] community owed their lives to [PAWN_nameDef], for no other hunter could bring home a feast large enough to feed the village like [PAWN_pronoun] could.

BackstoryDef.title: snowy scout
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef], being well-adept at traversing treacherous terrain, patrolled the snowy peaks for stranded travellers. [PAWN_pronoun] filled these poor backpackers with beer and housed them in [PAWN_possessive] log hut until they were fully recovered and ready to move on. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] grew attached to [PAWN_possessive] lodgers easily, and missed them terribly when they left.

BackstoryDef.title: dancer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] performed in a high-end tavern, catering to affluent and oftentimes undercover patrons, from royalty to oligarchs. [PAWN_nameDef] perfected [PAWN_possessive] craft, specialising in native dances that showcased [PAWN_possessive] flexibility and grace. \n\nThe sound of clattering jewellery would ring within the tavern walls as patrons applauded [PAWN_possessive] talent.

BackstoryDef.title: glaciologist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] set up camp in a bitter nook of [PAWN_possessive] homeworld to study alpine terrain, creatures and phenomena. [PAWN_pronoun] became a master of survival, and [PAWN_possessive] furry unguligrade legs gave [PAWN_objective] a mighty advantage over [PAWN_possessive] fleshy co-workers in the snow.

BackstoryDef.title: hotelier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] childhood friend built a hostel for wandering travellers. [PAWN_pronoun] made rooms for guests to rest in, while [PAWN_possessive] companion prepared hearty soups to fill their bellies.

BackstoryDef.title: hostel chef
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] childhood friend built a hostel for wandering travellers. [PAWN_pronoun] brewed hearty, thick soups to feed the exhausted lodgers, while [PAWN_possessive] friend maintained the place.

BackstoryDef.title: riddler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] engineered puzzle boxes, cryptic vessels and safes. [PAWN_nameDef] prides [PAWN_objective]self in [PAWN_possessive] knack for riddles and trickery, but using one’s brain so intensely calls for a couple of naps a day. Or so [PAWN_nameDef] says.

BackstoryDef.title: feral
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was captured and reared by pirates like a wild animal.
